pages.title: Locating Fortresses
pages.text: you can find a $(thing)Nether Fortress$() pretty easily? Yeah! Just pass by a $(thing)Soul Sand Valley$(), the souls there carry the item you need.
Find a way to locate $(thing)Nether Fortresses$() in the $(thing)Soul Sand Valley$().$(br2)You may need to swing a sword for this one, so be prepared!
